1.1 Topicalization in Breton (Anderson and Chung 1977)
(3) (a) [lenn a ran bemdez
eul levr brezhoneg]
to-read a book Breton PRT do-1sg every- day
"I read a Breton book every day."
1.1 Topicalization in Breton (Anderson and Chung 1977)
(a) [lenn eul levr brezhoneg] a ran bemdez
to-read a book Breton PRT do-1sg every-day
I read a Breton book every day.
(b) *[lenn Yannig] a ra eul levr brezhoneg bemdez
to-read Johnny PRT do-3sg a book Breton every- day
"Johnn y reads a Breton book ever y day."
*[lenn Yannig] a ra eul levr brezhoneg bemdez
to-read Johnny PRT do-3sg a book Breton every-day
Johnn y reads a Breton book ever y day.
